alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Pershing (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 17 at 5:50PM PDT until August 17 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northwestern Churchill County in west central Nevada... South central Pershing County in west central Nevada... * Until 745 PM PDT. * At 544 PM PDT, an area of blowing dust was detected by radar and moving east through the Basin and Range between Fernley and Lovelock and near Fallon. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This dust will impact I-80 between Trinity Junction and Oreana, including near Lovelock. Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Trinity Junction, Stillwater, Junction I-80 And U.S 95 (exit 83), Silver Hill, Lone Rock, Lovelock Derby Field Airport, Toulon Peak, and Battleground Point. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
